content.en: SAR image classification: Researchers are exploring the use of deep convolutional networks (ConvNets) to improve target classification in synthetic aperture radar (SAR) images. They are also investigating the potential of deep feature extraction from Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) and multiple feature aggregation to enhance SAR target classification. Additionally, algorithms such as wavelet-scattering convolution networks, deep feature fusion networks, and data augmentation techniques are being developed to improve SAR automatic target recognition.
content.da: SAR-billedklassifikation: Forskere undersøger brugen af dybe convolutionsnetværk (ConvNets) til at forbedre måleklassifikation i syntetiske aperture radar (SAR) billeder. De undersøger også potentialet i dyb funktionsekstraktion fra Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) og flere funktionsaggregeringer for at forbedre SAR-måleklassifikation. Derudover udvikles algoritmer som wavelet-scattering convolution-netværk, dybe funktion-fusion-netværk og dataforøgelsesteknikker for at forbedre automatisk måleanerkendelse i SAR.
